Class SodaCan

  • java.lang.Object
    • SodaCan

  • public class SodaCan
extends java.lang.Object
    Capture a Can of Soda. A Can of Soda has a type, amount (initially 250) and is initially closed. Once opened, you can sip (take at most 10) or gulp (take at most 50) from the can. Obviously, at all times, the amount of soda in the can is between 0 and 250. An opened can can not be closed.

    • Constructor Summary

      SodaCan(java.lang.String t)
      Construct a new SodaCan of the specified type.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SodaCan

        public SodaCan(java.lang.String t)
        Construct a new SodaCan of the specified type. The new can has 250 units in it, and is closed.
        Parameters:
        t - the type of soda, for example "RootBeer", "Coke", "Cherry"
